title: Lost and Found
description: In this Dateline classic, Keith Morrison reports on Pepper Smith’s search for her family and her true identity after being kidnapped at age 4. Originally aired on NBC on June 3, 2011.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
